text: right right Nakhcheer or Chal-Nakhjir is a cave situated in Markazi Province of Iran. It is a limestone cave approximately 70 million years old. Parts of the cave including its internal lake have been prepared for easy tourist access. It was discovered in 1989 and registered as a national monument in 2001. Its interior is made of crystals, dolomite sediments, stalactites and stalagmites.http://www.irancaves.com/fa/newsdetail.aspx?ID=261http://www.showcaves.com/english/ir/showcaves/ChalNakhjir.html ==See also== *List of caves in Iran *Geography of Iran ==References== Category:Archaeological sites in Iran Category:Caves of Iran Category:Tourist attractions in Markazi Province Category:Delijan County Category:Landforms of Markazi Province
title: Nakhcheer
